name: Hawksmoor Spitalfields
description: Prime cuts of matured beef and other British classics served in stripped-back, bare-brick surrounds.

reviews.author: Daled Dotan
reviews.comment: Do NOT miss this gem! It's expensive, but the  food and drinks are pure art, and the vibe and service couldn't be better. Went by myself (not so many places feel so inviting when dining alone!), ordered a perfect Sirloin, plus a surprisingly excellent cocktail based on bourbon and pineapple (yes, you heard me right. It actually tasted classy!). In short - best steak experience I had in years.

reviews.author: Steven Vos
reviews.comment: Friendly staff. I wasn't there for a meal but the bar downstairs had a great relaxed atmosphere. Cocktails and their recommendation were excellent.

reviews.author: Dave
reviews.comment: Great service, friendly helpful staff... amazing steak..best ive had to be honest.. will defo be going back.

reviews.author: Lorenzo
reviews.comment: Top quality stake! Good selection of wine. Good cocktails. Attentive service. Only too expensive!
